title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Fort Scott National Historic Site is open daily from 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. November 1 to April 30.Summer hours are 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. May 1-October 31.The park is closed on the following holidays: Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years Day.
